table.name: gtm_trans_line_reference
table.description: It is used to store the declaration line id  along with reference  transaction lines details.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: QUANTITY_VALUE
columns.description: Defines the quantity value of transaction line that is aggregated to the declaration line.

columns.name: QUANTITY_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Defines the unit of measure for the value that is aggregated to the declaration line.

columns.name: GTM_QUANTITY_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The GID used for the trade transaction line quantity qualifier. It is the quantity qualifier of the transaction line aggregated to the declaration line.

columns.name: GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM trade transaction line that is aggregated to the declaration line.

columns.name: TRANS_LINE_REF_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM trade transaction line that is aggregated to the declaration line.

columns.name: IS_PRIMARY
columns.description: Identifies the primary transaction among multiple transactions listed. The values are Y/N.

columns.name: TRANSACTION_REF_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM trade transaction related to the GTM trade transaction line that is aggregated to the declaration line.
